识别早发性阿尔茨海默病的标志性生物标志物马萨诸塞州总医院神经内科的神经科学家 Alexandra Touroutoglou 博士和 Bradford Dickerson 医学博士是一项新研究的主要作者，该研究发表在《阿尔茨海默病与痴呆》杂志上，《散发性早发性阿尔茨海默病萎缩特征：初步发现》纵向早发性阿尔茨海默病研究 (LEADS) 队列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Identifying-a-signature-biomarker-for-early-onset-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Identifying-a-signature-biomarker-for-early-onset-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=350870a9-b384-455c-99d9-611926412fb5 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 12:10:32 -0400 Identifying a signature biomarker for early-onset Alzheimer's disease

联邦政府试图阻止孕妇服用药物过量的问题日益严重2009 年，当安德里亚·彼得森 (Andria Peterson) 开始在内华达州亨德森圣罗斯多米尼加医院的儿科和新生儿重症监护室担任临床药剂师时，她亲眼目睹了阿片类药物危机对医院最年轻的患者造成的毁灭性影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Feds-try-to-head-off-forming-problem-of-overdoses-among-expectant-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Feds-try-to-head-off-grinding-problem-of-overdoses-among-expectant-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=722968fe-60ec-41e7-a07d-15f69340033a Thu, 19 Oct 2023 08:41:59 -0400 Feds try to head off growing problem of overdoses among expectant mothers
